mace.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a spice made from the dried shell of a nutmeg
mace.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a heavy ball with sharp points on a short metal stick, used in the past as a weapon
mace.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a decorated stick that is carried by an official in some ceremonies as a sign of power
mace.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a chemical which makes your eyes and skin sting painfully. Police officers sometimes carry Mace in cans to defend themselves.
